be.thibaulthelsmoortel.helsmoortelUtil.util.converters

Class CurrencyConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.thibaulthelsmoortel.helsmoortelUtil.util.converters.CurrencyConverter

  • public class CurrencyConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for converting currency values with Euro (EUR) as base currency.
    Author:
    Thibault Helsmoortel

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public static java.math.BigDecimal convert(java.math.BigDecimal value,
                                           Currency.CurrencyCode source,
                                           Currency.CurrencyCode target)
        Principal method of the conversion class. Converts and returns a BigDecimal value based on source and target currencies.
        Parameters:
        value - the value of the source currency
        source - the ISO code of the source currency
        target - the ISO code of the target currency
        Returns:
        the converted value from the source currency to the target currency

      • convert

        public static java.math.BigDecimal convert(java.math.BigDecimal value,
                                           Currency source,
                                           Currency target)
        Overload conversion method to support custom currencies. Converts and returns a BigDecimal value based on source and target currencies.
        Parameters:
        value - the value of the source currency
        source - the source currency
        target - the target currency
        Returns:
        the converted value from the source currency to the target currency

        the converted value from the source currency to PHP
